content.description:
This is the second major area you will come to after passing Chandler Park. Little Tijuana will be on your left opposite the Arkansas River on your right.

 Approx. 2 miles past Chandler Park entrance there should be a big pull-off / parking area on the left side of the road for Little Germany. Approx. 1/2 mile past that will be a small pull-off on the right (north) side of the road, just before the guardrail.
